attributes.action: stop BT's monopoly position as the only supplier of above ground phone connections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present BT and Virgin Media are the only companies in Britain that can offer a phone connection (although other companies can bill for this connection). Virgin Media has relatively little influence, being only economical in high population areas.

We would like the government to allow other companies to compete with BT in a like to like manor, allowing them to install above ground cables and connections.
